references: S. M. Kerawala, Asymptotic solution of the "Probleme des menages", Bull. Calcutta Math. Soc., 39 (1947), 82-84.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: S. M. Kerawala, Asymptotic solution of the "Probleme des menages, Bull. Calcutta Math. Soc., 39 (1947), 82-84. [Annotated scanned copy]
formula: Let b(n) satisfy (n-2)*b(n)-n*(n-2)*b(n-1)-n*b(n-2)=0; write b(n)=(n!/e^2)*(1+sum a_r/n^r, r=1..inf).a(n) = n!*Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^k*Stirling2(n,k)/k!. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 17 2006E.g.f.: 1 + x*(1 - E(0) )/(1-x) where E(k) = 1 + 1/(1-x*(k+1))/(k+1)/(1-x/(x-1/E(k+1) )); (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 19 2013E.g.f.: 1 + x*(1 - S)/(1-x) where S=sum(k>=0, ( 1+1/(1-x-x*k)/(k+1) )*x^k/prod(i=0..k-1, (1-x-x*i)*(i+1) ) ). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 21 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
